questions_and_notes: lambda443nm should be included in dimensions; Why is the wavelength inconsistent with lambda440nm used for od440aer-tavg-z0-hxy-x  (od440aer-AERmon)?
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
comment: Total aerosol AOD due to dust aerosol at a wavelength of 443 nanometres.
